name: Café d'abord
description: Simple coffee ordering app. Solo project.

name: Pintreach
description: Pintreach is an article sharing application and research tool designed to enable saving and discovery of information on the internet. Solo project.
languages: React | Java | Spring | PostgreSQL | Context API | Material UI | Axios | Yup

name: Water Me
description: With an easy to use interface for creating a plant watering schedule tailored to each individual plant, Water Me will remind users when it's time to feed their plants.
languages: React | Java | Spring | PostgreSQL | Material UI | Axios | Yup

name: Game of Life
description: React js game that allows the user to create their own grid formations or choose a preset formation. There are some rules which alter the state of the cells. By pressing start, you can see how your formation evolves.
